other_tests.findings: Opening pressure elevated at 310 mm H2O; lymphocytosis (12.2 white cells per mm3, 100% lymphocytes in Tube 1), elevated protein level at 71.4 mg/dl.
other_tests.changes_over_time: On the third hospital day, white cells decreased to 7 (55% lymphocytes, 45% monocytes) in Tube 1 and protein level decreased to 46 mg/dl.

other_tests.findings: Mild intimal hyperplasia; no evidence of giant-cell arteritis.
Grew Klebsiella pneumoniae, Candida albicans, and normal flora.
